Subskills.name: Last Mortal Act
Subskills.description: Ripped souls deal a portion of the damage.

Subskills.name: Solidify
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by soul spurn.

Subskills.name: Soulfilled Tradeoff
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by soul spurn but decreases the area of effect radius.

Subskills.name: Repeating Reaping
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to deal increased damage.

Subskills.name: Consume
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to unleash an additional soul spurn.

Subskills.name: Highway to Purgatory
Subskills.description: Increases the speed of ripped souls.

Subskills.name: Restore
Subskills.description: Soul spurn recovers a portion of your maximum mana on hit.

Subskills.name: Revitalise
Subskills.description: Soul spurn recovers a portion of your maximum life on hit.

Subskills.name: Harvest the Damned
Subskills.description: Monsters killed by soul spurn inflicts you with a buff increasing your arcane damage, life replenish and mana replenish for a short duration.

Subskills.name: Floating Cultist
Subskills.description: Reduces movement diminish when using soul spurn.

Subskills.name: Shattering Destruction
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict arcane break on hit.

Subskills.name: Corrupted Rapture
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of soul spurn.

Subskills.name: Purgatory
Subskills.description: Soul spurn becomes a toggle skill ripping souls from monsters around you draining a portion of your maximum life frequently.

Subskills.name: Lifeline Tether
Subskills.description: Rip souls for all nearby allies restoring their mana and life.
